title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama. Chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models from Node or the browser.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama. Simple synchronous & async APIs to chat, generate, embed, and list local models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama. Use any local Ollama model as an LLM or chat component inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (formerly Ollama WebUI). ChatGPT-like interface, model manager, multi-user, dark/light themes.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama. Generate, chat, pull, and manage models from JVM applications with fluent APIs.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama. Idiomatic Ruby client to chat, generate, and manage local LLMs.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI for Ollama with conversation history, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-like inline code assistant.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and docker-compose examples for running Ollama server + webui stack with GPU support.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration for Ollama. Use local models as generators or chatters in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama. Simple C# client with async streaming, embeddings, and model management.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama + LangChain + Chroma. Upload PDFs and chat with them locally.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri-based desktop GUI for Ollama (Rust+React). Cross-platform tray app for chatting with local models.

title: ollama-npm-package
summary: Official npm package for Ollama. Zero-dependency TypeScript client that works in Node and modern browsers.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package for Ollama. Lightweight Python client with asyncio support and automatic model pulling.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot that lets servers chat with any Ollama model via slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds an Ollama sidebar for local AI-assisted note writing and summarization.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate for Ollama. Async client using reqwest with streaming support and strong typing.

title: ollama-spring-boot-starter
summary: Spring Boot auto-configuration for Ollama4j. Inject Ollama service beans and configure models via application.yml.
